content.p: Discover our sustainability courses Study towards a greener future at the University of Nottingham This is the place that's making the sustainable obtainable. The University of Nottingham is the perfect place to study for a greener future. We're the 7th most sustainable university in the world (UI GreenMetric World University Ranking 2023) and our leading research is solving real-world problems as we work towards our 17 Sustainable Development Goals. We have a huge range of courses, both undergraduate and postgraduate, that draw from our sustainable research to educate and inspire the next generation. Discover some of our sustainability-focused courses below or view our full range of undergraduate and postgraduate courses and PhD opportunities. From 2025 onwards, on the following courses you will have the option to study two sustainability focused modules: Exploring Sustainability and Sustainability Action.
